*Mantella nods and walks to the weapon tray. She takes a machine gun and
straps it over her shoulder and then takes three grenades and picks up a
pouch and puts the grenade in it and then picks up a heavy blaster rifle and
puts it in the pouch and then her shoulder cannons pop out and she runs out
with Magmatron and fires the machine gun at the ship at full blast hoping it
does some affect*
